entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
